name: The Lost Isles
description:
The Lost Isle's servers shut off at midnight, you haven't played in years but you log on one last time to say farewell to the game. After glancing at the chat, you remember your friend that you haven't played with in 5 years. You can't help but wonder if he's still waiting for you where you used to meet up.

The Lost Isle's is my second finished game and my first game jam game. I created all the assets myself except for the animations for the bipedal creatures and some of the sounds. The human animations all came from Mixamo and a few of the sound effects are from the YouTube Audio library. I made all of the character and object models using MagicaVoxel, created the soundtrack with BeepBox, and the opening cutscene was made using Microsoft PowerPoint. The game is still a little bit buggy and some of the AI get's hung up, so thanks for playing!
